schema.name: Healthyfied Pork Nilaga
recipeIngredient: 300 g, Pork / Boston Butt, Raw (夾心肉, 生)

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Pork / Boston Butt under cold water.
Chop the green cabbage and dice the pumpkin into bite-sized pieces.
Mince the garlic and slice the onion.
In a large pot, bring the 2 liters of water to a boil.
Add the pork to the boiling water, reduce heat to medium, and simmer for 45 minutes or until the pork is tender.
Incorporate the garlic, onion, green cabbage, and pumpkin into the pot. Season with fish sauce, salt, and black pepper.
Continue to simmer for an additional 20 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
Adjust the seasoning as needed, and serve hot.

schema.description: Indulge in the comforting flavors of our Healthyfied Pork Nilaga, a classic Filipino stew reimagined to fit a low-carb, low-sugar lifestyle without compromising on taste. This heartwarming dish, enriched with tender pork, vibrant green cabbage, and sweet pumpkin, offers a perfect balance of nutrition and flavor. Ideal for health-conscious individuals looking for high-sodium yet healthy recipes.
